overview: SexArt has revolutionized and redefined the world of online erotic entertainment. With the launch of the SexArt DVD series, the award-winning website's incomparable cinematic erotica can now be enjoyed in the comfort and intimacy of your living room or home theater. Volume 1, "Pure Pleasure," is everything the title implies. The most beautiful and passionate SexArt models in the most intriguing, arousing, feverishly hot, and super-premium XXX movies ever lensed; join international super-beauty Dido A and her closest friends for an experience that's nothing less than "Pure Pleasure."
title: SexArt Volume One
